title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autodesk Assistant: Building an Agentic Platform on Bedrock (ISV322)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autodesk Assistant：在 Bedrock 上构建智能体平台 (ISV322)
abstract: Autodesk tackled fragmented workflows and inconsistent experiences across its product portfolio by building the Autodesk Assistant Platform— a next-generation, agentic AI partner that unifies capabilities, anticipates needs, and performs complex tasks in collaboration with its human counterpart. Powered by Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands, the platform seamlessly bridges cloud and desktop environments while coordinating domain-specific agents and MCP servers to deliver contextual insights and automate complex workflows. This session explores Autodesk's architecture, implementation approach, and key lessons learned in designing and scaling an agentic platform that breaks down product silos at enterprise scale.
abstract_cn: Autodesk通过构建Autodesk Assistant Platform——一个下一代代理式AI合作伙伴，解决了其产品组合中碎片化的工作流程和不一致的体验问题。该平台统一了各项能力，能够预测需求，并与人类协作执行复杂任务。该平台由Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands提供支持，无缝连接云端和桌面环境，同时协调特定领域的代理和MCP服务器，以提供上下文洞察并自动化复杂工作流程。本次会议探讨了Autodesk的架构、实施方法，以及在企业规模下设计和扩展代理式平台以打破产品孤岛方面的关键经验教训。
